text: Rostislav Borisovich Rybakov (; (28 March 1938 â€“ 7 August 2019) was a Russian scholar. His syudies were about Oriental Studies. He was also a writer and the director of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences (Institute of Oriental Studies). He was one of the founders of PEACE through CULTURE, a non governmental organization based in Austria. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Russian educators Category:Writers from Moscow
title: Rostislav Rybakov
